name: The Electron Tape
overview:
This cassette contains 123 programs for your Electron. Many of the programs are quite short, but each one is designed to help the beginner understand a particular programming technique. Some of the larger programs are useful utilities in their own right and other provide the ofundations for fairly elaborate programming projects in sound, graphics, animation and games.

The programs are all described in The Electron Book: Basic, Sound & Graphics by the same authors, who give many hints and suggestions for improving and extending the programs and for writing new programs of your own. Using this cassette will eliminate time wasted both in typing programs from the book and in trying to find errors due to typing mistakes.
